tns:patch.author: Octavian Ciubotaru
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_indicator_type; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_indicator_type AS SELECT con.activity_id amp_activity_id, CASE ind.type WHEN 'A' THEN 'Ascending' :: VARCHAR(255) WHEN 'D' THEN 'Descending' :: VARCHAR(255) ELSE NULL :: VARCHAR(255) END "value", CASE ind.type WHEN 'A' THEN 1 :: BIGINT WHEN 'D' THEN 2 :: BIGINT ELSE 3 :: BIGINT END id, ind.indicator_id AS me_indicator_id, si.amp_sector_id AS me_indicator_sector_id, aux.log_frame_id AS me_indicator_logframe_id, aux.risk_rating_id AS me_indicator_risk_id FROM amp_indicator_connection con JOIN amp_indicator ind ON ind.indicator_id = con.indicator_id LEFT JOIN amp_sector_indicator si ON ind.indicator_id = si.indicator_id JOIN amp_indicator_connection_aux aux ON con.id = aux.indicator_connection_id WHERE con.sub_clazz :: TEXT = 'a' :: TEXT;
